mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User (idx, email, password, name, nickname, phonenumber, sex, profile_img_loc, year, month, day, cornfirm, type, type, gall_count, user_subscribe_count) VALUES (#{idx}, #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nicName}, #{phonenumber}, #{sex}, #{profile_img_loc}, #{year}, #{month}, #{day}, #{cornfirm}, #{type}, #{gall_count}, #{user_subscribe_count})
